attributes.action: Make the telephone number 888 an emergency number for access to the Samaritans.
attributes.additional_details: The telephone number for the Samaritans Organisation needs and must be a simple to remember number the same way that the 999 number for emergency services is.
attributes.background: Make the telephone number for the Samaritans organisation a simple to remember non geographical number.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Ofcom are responsible for telephone numbering in the UK.

You can find out how to contact Ofcom at:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/about-ofcom/contact-us
